name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Barrie L. HURTUBISE, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Barrie L. HURTUBISE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph P. Green, Jr., West Chester, for B. Hurtubise.
Stuart Suss, West Chester, for Commonwealth.
casebody.head_matter:
634 A.2d 214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Barrie L. HURTUBISE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 8, 1993.
Decided Dec. 16, 1993.
Joseph P. Green, Jr., West Chester, for B. Hurtubise.
Stuart Suss, West Chester, for Commonwealth.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
